what: orbweaver: Fast and Efficient Graph Data Structures — orbweaver-package
title: orbweaver: Fast and Efficient Graph Data Structures — orbweaver-package
text: Empower data analysis 'orbweaver', R package designed effortless construction analysis graph data structures. 'orbweaver', can seamlessly build manipulate graph structures, leveraging high-performance methods filtering, joining, mutating data within R environment. Drawing inspiration efficiency 'data.table' package, 'orbweaver' ensures mutations changes graph performed place, streamlining workflow optimal productivity.
